client = FakeClient()
control_base = WebOSControlBase(client)
control_base.COMMANDS = {'test': {'uri': '/test', 'validation': lambda *
    args: (False, 'err'), 'validation_error': 'Error'}}
client.setup_response('/test', {'resp': True})
with raises(IOError):
    control_base.test(block=True)
